title: Balala Xiao Mo Xian: Mofa Xing Yuan Bao

alternative_titles.en: Balala the Fairies: Magic Star Fate Castle
alternative_titles.ja: 巴啦啦小魔仙之魔法星缘堡

synopsis:
Normal Girls who live a normal life until they discover a Magical Fairy Kingdom, magical elves grant them magical powers from Magic Star Fate Castle, to save the Magic Star Fate castle they will need to fight a villain called "Fesna". Will they be able to recover all the Magic Stones?

(Source: Balala the Fairies Wiki)
